Params: {1: '1', 3: 'The Program Ghost twitches. "Bianca" stands in front of it, slowly disappearing.'}
{3: 'Liv runs the Inver-Device at full power, dashing toward the vanishing "Bianca" as Lucia and Lee flank her from both sides.'}
{3: '"Bianca" vanishes into thin air, leaving only a shadow behind.'}
{2: "We're not done yet. Analyze the Program Ghost now!", 3: '16'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Understood! She doesn't have time to cover up her track now. We'll find her if we just follow it!", 4: '2'}
